title: Failed to apply: Validation error: Position out of range for measure
description:
dispatched_by: boot

When applying assistant edits in tabula, consistently getting:

Failed to apply: Validation error: Position 12 out of range for measure (max: 11)

This suggests off-by-one or bounds checking issue in the edit application logic.
close_reason: Fixed by adding fix_position_bounds() method and updating system prompt to document time signature position limits

title: Fix unexpected cfg hydrate feature warnings
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: unexpected `cfg` condition value: `hydrate`
  --> src/lib.rs:16:7
   |
16 | #[cfg(feature = "hydrate")]
   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

Lines 16 and 19 in src/lib.rs reference `feature = "hydrate"` but this feature isn't defined in Cargo.toml.

## Fix Options
1. Add `hydrate` feature to Cargo.toml if it's needed
2. Remove the cfg blocks if they're dead code
3. Replace with appropriate feature flag

Check if this is leptos-related (hydrate is common in leptos SSR setups).

title: Remove unused imports across codebase
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

Remove all unused imports:

1. `src/ai/preview.rs:7` - Remove `Measure`, `Note`, `Track`
2. `src/components/tab_editor.rs:15` - Remove `EditPreview`
3. `src/input/mod.rs:3` - Remove `wasm_bindgen::prelude::*`
4. `src/playback/midi_builder.rs:21` - Remove `MidiEventType`
5. `src/playback/midi_builder.rs:23-24` - Remove `POSITIONS_PER_BEAT`, `TrackType`
6. `src/renderer/canvas_measure.rs:18` - Remove `STAFF_LINE_SPACING`
7. `src/renderer/canvas_measure.rs:546` - Remove `crate::music::drums::DrumPiece`
8. `src/renderer/effects.rs:16` - Remove `TremoloBarPoint`

## Fix
Simply remove the unused imports from each file.

title: Fix deprecated MaybeSignal usage
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: use of deprecated enum \`leptos::prelude::MaybeSignal\`
  --> src/renderer/canvas_renderer.rs:48:46
   |
48 |     #[prop(optional, into)] container_width: MaybeSignal<f64>,
   |                                              ^^^^^^^^^^^
```

Lines 48-49 in src/renderer/canvas_renderer.rs use deprecated `MaybeSignal<T>`.

## Fix
Replace `MaybeSignal<T>` with `Signal<T>` per leptos 0.7 migration.

```rust
// Before
#[prop(optional, into)] container_width: MaybeSignal<f64>,
#[prop(optional, into)] show_notation: MaybeSignal<bool>,

// After  
#[prop(optional, into)] container_width: Signal<f64>,
#[prop(optional, into)] show_notation: Signal<bool>,
```

title: Fix deprecated positions_per_measure calls
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: use of deprecated method \`models::Measure::positions_per_measure\`: Use total_positions() instead
```

4 occurrences:
1. `src/components/tab_editor.rs:2178`
2. `src/renderer/mod.rs:369`
3. `src/editor/mod.rs:1441`
4. `src/renderer/mod.rs:136`

## Fix
Replace all `.positions_per_measure()` calls with `.total_positions()`.

title: Remove dead code (unused methods, constants, functions)
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

Dead code to remove or use:

### Methods
1. `src/ai/plan.rs:989` - `validate_position` method
2. `src/playback/mod.rs:503` - `tick_to_position` method
3. `src/playback/audio_loop.rs:381` - `advance_speed_trainer` method
4. `src/playback/metronome.rs:233` - `seconds_per_beat` method

### Constants
5. `src/components/fretboard.rs:27` - `BASE_FRET_WIDTH`
6. `src/components/fretboard.rs:30` - `MIN_FRET_WIDTH`
7. `src/components/fretboard.rs:54` - `FRET_MARKER`
8. `src/components/theme_settings.rs:192` - `THEME_SETTINGS_STYLES`
9. `src/playback/midi_builder.rs:51` - `PROGRAM_ELECTRIC_GUITAR`

### Functions
10. `src/renderer/layout.rs:187` - `calculate_system_height`

### Fields
11. `src/playback/audio_loop.rs:81` - `soundfont_bytes` field in MidiPlayer

## Fix
For each item:
- If truly unused, remove it
- If needed for future use, prefix with `#[allow(dead_code)]` with a comment explaining why
- If it should be used, wire it up

title: bd sync deletes source files - caused loss of ogent-issues-graph.el
notes:
Investigation 2026-01-05:

Reviewed bd sync code paths. All file operations appear correctly scoped to .beads/:
- restoreBeadsDirFromBranch: git checkout HEAD -- <beadsDir>  
- git reset --hard: only in beads worktree, not main repo
- git clean -f: scoped to beadsDir only

Possible causes (unconfirmed):
1. Redirect file (.beads/redirect) pointing to wrong location
2. FindBeadsDir() returning unexpected path in edge case
3. Unrelated git operation (not bd sync)

Cannot reproduce without:
- Exact scenario/steps
- Git status before/after
- Whether file was tracked/staged

Recommend: Add logging to sync operations to capture file operations for future debugging.
close_reason: Cannot reproduce - insufficient context. Reopen if it happens again with reproduction steps.
